gameObjects

Class Territory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.erebos.engine.physics.Collidable
      • com.erebos.engine.path.PathFollower
        • com.erebos.engine.entity.Entity
          • com.erebos.engine.entity.ImageEntity
            • gameObjects.Territory

  • public class Territory
extends com.erebos.engine.entity.ImageEntity
    The Class Territory contains an image for drawing the Territory to the screen and contains objects that a Territory encapsulates.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Territory

        public Territory(org.newdawn.slick.SpriteSheet ss,
         java.lang.String name,
         boolean isLand,
         boolean hasSC,
         boolean hasCoast)
        Instantiates a new territory. By default it sets the Territory as NEUTRAL.
        Parameters:
        ss - the sprite sheet
        name - the name
        isLand - true, if land
        hasSC - true, if Territory has supply center
        hasCoast - true, if Territory has coast

    • Method Detail

      • addAdjacent

        public void addAdjacent(java.lang.String t)
        Adds an adjacent Territory to the list. Uses Strings since they are less intensive than instantiating new Territories in every Territory.
        Parameters:
        t - the Territory as a String

      • eDraw

        public void eDraw()
        Draws the Territory to the screen.

        public boolean equals(Territory t)
        Checks if a Territory equals another. Specifically it checks the names of each Territory.
        Parameters:
        t - the Territory
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • removeUnit

        public void removeUnit()
        Removes the occupying unit. Will set the owner of the Territory to NEUTRAL if it does not have a supply center.
